summary: Website for 'Espirit de corps' – a social media management agency that handles accounts for celebrities and brands. Services include video reels editing, poster advertisements, crisis campaign management, and landing page development. The site needs a company profile, vision/mission statements, CEO bio, services section, and an attractive CTA with demo videos and poster samples.
architectural_notes: Static or lightweight website; no backend required unless contact form is added
Branding: Company name is 'Espirit de corps'; target audience includes celebrities and brands

existing_features.title: Create a hero/landing section with the company name 'Espirit de corps', a bold tagline about elite social media management, and a prominent CTA button ('Get Started' / 'Book a Consultation'). The hero should feel high-energy and premium.

Create a Company Profile section that introduces Espirit de corps as a full-service social media management agency specializing in building and maintaining social media accounts for celebrities, influencers, and brands – offering end-to-end support from content creation to virality.

Create a Vision & Mission section with separate, clearly labeled subsections. Vision should convey aspiring to be the leading social media management agency. Mission should describe delivering end-to-end social media growth, content strategy, and brand virality for clients.
Create an 'About the CEO' section with a placeholder CEO name, a short inspirational bio describing their expertise in social media growth and digital branding, and a profile image placeholder.

Create a Services section showcasing four service cards: (1) Video Reels – editing, content ideas, and viral strategy; (2) Poster Advertisements – high-impact visual ad creatives; (3) Crisis Campaign Management – rapid response and reputation management; (4) Landing Page Development – conversion-optimized pages. Each card should have an icon, title, and short description.

Create a Portfolio/Demo section with an attractive layout showing: (a) 3 demo video reel placeholders rendered as styled video cards with play button overlays using the generated reel thumbnail images; (b) 3 poster advertisement samples using the generated poster sample images. This section should feel like a creative agency showcase.

Create a bottom CTA section with a compelling headline (e.g., 'Ready to Go Viral?'), a subheading, and two buttons: 'Contact Us' and 'View Our Services'. Include a contact form with fields for Name, Email, Phone, and Message, and a submit button.

Apply a bold, cinematic dark-mode visual theme throughout the site – using deep charcoal/black backgrounds, gold/amber accent colors for highlights and CTAs, and clean modern typography. Use smooth scroll between sections, subtle entrance animations on scroll, and a sticky navigation bar with the company name and section links.
Render all generated static images (hero background, CEO portrait, reel thumbnails, poster samples, service icons) from the frontend/public/assets/generated directory.

In the CEOSection component, update the CEO name displayed in the h3 element (located at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[4]/div[2]/div[2]/div[2]/h3[1]) from the current placeholder name to 'Saravana Kumar'.

In the ContactCTA component, update the email address displayed in the contact info card (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[7]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[2]/div[2]) to 'saravana@espiritdecrops.com'. Also update any mailto: href associated with this email to use the same address.

In the ContactCTA component, update the phone number displayed in the contact info card (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[7]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[3]/div[2]/div[2]) to '+91 7259145275'. Also update any tel: href associated with this phone to use the same number.

In the ContactCTA component, update the location/address text displayed in the contact info card (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[7]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]) to 'Bangalore – All India Remote Available'.
